messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Therapy, was Back and Forth!!
messages.msgSnippet: No worries on that we have 2 horses, a dog, a cat , the turtle. and soon we will have 3 cows, too many chickens to count , 3 dogs , and too many cats to count.
messages.messageBody:
No worries on that we have 2 horses, a dog, a cat , the turtle. and soon we
will have 3 cows, too many chickens to count , 3 dogs , and too many cats to
count. So maybe well just blend and noone will know we are there!! LOL
PS not to mention the 16 or so horses in the barn
We cant wait

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Therapy, was Back and Forth!!
messages.msgSnippet: I think I will be doing that therapy myself on Monday (after all the rain stops this weekend) - by then it will be like pulling out trees! I know my garden is
messages.messageBody:
I think I will be doing that therapy myself on Monday (after all the rain stops
this weekend) - by then it will be like pulling out trees! I know my garden is
in there somewhere! I think my dogs are lost in the tall grass too (and they're
Huskies!). I know that we just cut the grass and pulled the weeds last week but
we've had sooooooo much rain that everything (except the garden) is growing
faster than we can keep up with it. Free therapy at my house too!
